name: Stir Crazy
description:
This is a submission for the one map challenge more info here.

A wizard has been teleported into a tower by demons.  Upon waking inside this tower, the wizard known as Pyre Lord finds himself unable to leave.  After spending a while inside the tower, Pyre Lord grows very bored and notices one of the shelves seems rather empty.  Then, he notices a summoning circle at the corner of the room.  Thus, his master plan of gathering the head of a demon springs into action!  Will Pyre Lord succeed in his plan?  Or will he meet his end at the hands of the mighty demon!?  Find out in *pause for effect*...Stir Crazy!
